name: questmaker
description: Web application for creating and managing quests.  ## Installation Use `git clone  https://github.com/Quest-maker-team/quest-maker` to load repo in your computer. ## Dependencies ### Virtual environment You may install dependencies to isolated environment (only for this project). Enter `python venv venv` in `website` directory to create virtual environment with name `venv`.  Then activate it with command `venv/Scripts/activate`. ### Packages You may use pip - standard python package manager. Enter `pip install -r requirements.txt` to install packages.
